rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0001
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]What do you think you are doing,
breaking my lovely seal?!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0002
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I was so happy stuck in this room!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Just me and all this priceless treasure,
with nobody to interfere!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0005
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps this was my fault for including
a release mechanism. One can hardly
blame adventurers for their curiosity...

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0006
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]The only problem is, I now need to
procure great volumes of cash to
create a new seal...

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0007
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps I can put the curiosity of these
hapless adventurers to good use...!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0008
rows.name:
Tell me, my friends! Have you heard
the legends of the Golden Monsters?!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0009
rows.name:
They are a most special breed of
monster. Very proud. Terribly fierce.
Unspeakably strong.

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0010
rows.name:
For a not-so-small payment, I might
be willing to tell you where these
legendary beasts can be found!

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0011
rows.name:
Since you were strong enough to break
my seal, you must be brave heroes who
would relish a legendary battle, yes?

rows.label: tlk70000153_01_msg0101
rows.name:
Allow me to point you in the direction
of the legendary Golden Monsters.
